description: Audsley mentions this stop in passing, saying only that it appears in the organ in Christ Church, Newgate Street, London, England. Irwin mentions it in a list of mixture stops under the heading �Color Due to Stop Pitches�, but gives no definition. Examples None known. Contributions welcome. Bibliography Audsley[2]: I.XIII Nineteenth. Irwin[1]: Appendix D. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only. LarigotMixture.html - Last updated 11 October 2000.
